gov.nih.nlm.nls.util

Class MaskingThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.nih.nlm.nls.util.MaskingThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class MaskingThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class attempts to erase characters echoed to the console. This code is originally from the Sun Developer Network (SDN) site.
    Name: Password Masking in the Java Programming Language
    URL: http://java.sun.com/developer/technicalArticles/Security/pwordmask/
    Author: Qusay H. Mahmoud with contributions from Alan Sommerer
    Date: July 2004

    License (from Sun Developer Network site)
